mn10:2.1: “Ekayano ayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya, sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya, dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya, nayassa adhigamaya, nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam cattaro satipatthana.
mn10:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;

mn10:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati?
mn10:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati, pallankam abhujitva, ujum kayam panidhaya, parimukham satim upatthapetva.
mn10:4.4: Digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati,

mn10:4.7: ‘Passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.
mn10:4.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dakkho bhamakaro va bhamakarantevasi va digham va anchanto ‘digham anchami’ti pajanati, rassam va anchanto ‘rassam anchami’ti pajanati;
mn10:4.9: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu digham va assasanto ‘digham assasami’ti pajanati, digham va passasanto ‘digham passasami’ti pajanati, rassam va assasanto ‘rassam assasami’ti pajanati, rassam va passasanto ‘rassam passasami’ti pajanati;
mn10:4.11: ‘passambhayam kayasankharam assasissami’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayam kayasankharam passasissami’ti sikkhati.

mn10:34.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saragam va cittam ‘saragam cittan’ti pajanati.
mn10:35.1: Iti ajjhattam va citte cittanupassi viharati, bahiddha va citte cittanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va citte cittanupassi viharati;

mn10:36.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati?
mn10:36.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati pancasu nivaranesu.
mn10:36.3: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati pancasu nivaranesu?
mn10:36.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santam va ajjhattam kamacchandam ‘atthi me ajjhattam kamacchando’ti pajanati, asantam va ajjhattam kamacchandam ‘natthi me ajjhattam kamacchando’ti pajanati; yatha ca anuppannassa kamacchandassa uppado hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca uppannassa kamacchandassa pahanam hoti tanca pajanati, yatha ca pahinassa kamacchandassa ayatim anuppado hoti tanca pajanati.

mn10:43.2: samudayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, vayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati.

mn10:43.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati sattasu bojjhangesu.
mn10:44.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu.
mn10:44.2: Kathanca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu?
mn10:44.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yathabhutam pajanati, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
mn10:45.1: Iti ajjhattam va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, bahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati, ajjhattabahiddha va dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati;
mn10:45.2: samudayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, vayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati, samudayavayadhammanupassi va dhammesu viharati.
mn10:45.3: ‘Atthi dhamma’ti va panassa sati paccupatthita hoti. Yavadeva nanamattaya patissatimattaya anissito ca viharati, na ca kinci loke upadiyati.
mn10:45.4: Evampi kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati catusu ariyasaccesu.
mn10:46.1: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya satta vassani, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
mn10:46.2: dittheva dhamme anna; sati va upadisese anagamita.
mn10:46.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya cha vassani …pe…
mn10:46.11: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya satta masani, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
mn10:46.12: dittheva dhamme anna; sati va upadisese anagamita.
mn10:46.14: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya cha masani …pe…
mn10:46.22: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, ime cattaro satipatthane evam bhaveyya sattaham, tassa dvinnam phalanam annataram phalam patikankham
mn10:46.23: dittheva dhamme anna sati va upadisese anagamitati.
mn10:47.1: ‘Ekayano ayam, bhikkhave, maggo sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya yadidam cattaro satipatthana’ti.
mn10:47.2: Iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
mn10:47.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
